Services: FieldHelper

FieldHelper

FieldHelper()

Various helper methods for functionality shared between formFor field directives.

Source:

Methods

(static) this.getLabel($attributes, valueToHumanize) → {String}

Determines the field's label based on its current attributes and the FormForConfiguration configuration settings.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
$attributes Hash

Directive link $attributes
valueToHumanize Object

Default value (if no override specified on $attributes)

Returns:

Label to display (or null if no label)

Type
String

(static) this.manageFieldRegistration($scope, formForController)

Helper method that registers a form field and stores the bindable object returned on the $scope. This method also unregisters the field on $scope $destroy.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
$scope $scope

Input field $scope
formForController Object

Controller object for parent formFor
